channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MAHOUT-859] Move Decision Forests to classifier package
item.description: The Decision/Random forest code is a classifier and should be located under the classifier package.
item.summary: Move Decision Forests to classifier package

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Integrated in Mahout-Quality #1136 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Mahout-Quality/1136/)
